step_feedback.feedback: Your shoulder movements are generally good, but try to keep your wrists a bit more stable and closer to your body to focus the movement on your shoulders.
You're doing a great job with the shoulder rolls! Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Keep your elbows and wrists relatively still to maximize the shoulder movement.
Excellent! You're completing the repetitions well. Remember to breathe deeply as you pull your shoulders back to enhance the benefits of the exercise.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with your shoulder rolls! Keep focusing on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Remember to breathe deeply as you move to help with lymphatic flow and oxygen.
